item.title: Reasons to Explore Rust and A Brief Intro
item.description: Four years ago, I began studying Python as my first programming language. I have enjoyed it so much. I now enjoy going to work and writing Python scripts for up to 60% of a typical work day. I love the language. I've also dabbled in JavaScript, CSS and HTML, but â€¦
